title: Client problems
body: everytime i open my league client it says the client update has begun and once i hit launch it opens league as if nothing happened and im on the login screen

replies.body: This could be happening for different reasons, but something seems to be preventing you from updating.  Start off with the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your patcher has permissions to get this updates.  Settings may have changed with your OS or even antivirus, so that should help!
